display.title: Van Insurance
display.subtitle: Van Insurance
display.bodyHtml: We’ll ask a few questions about you, your van and how it’s used.

questions.title: When do you want cover to start?
questions.help: You can choose today or a future date.

questions.title: Do you hold a valid UK driving licence?
Use the details of the person who will own the policy.

display.title: Use the details of the person who will own the policy.
display.bodyHtml: Use the details of the person who will own the policy.

questions.title: Where is the van kept overnight?
Tell us how the van is used so we can offer the right cover.

display.title: Tell us how the van is used so we can offer the right cover.
display.bodyHtml: Tell us how the van is used so we can offer the right cover.

questions.title: Do you want to protect your no-claims discount?
Add anyone who will drive the van. You can add more than one driver.

display.title: Add anyone who will drive the van. You can add more than one driver.
display.bodyHtml: Add anyone who will drive the van. You can add more than one driver.

display.title: Drivers
display.bodyHtml: This section supports multiple items in a full build. For this prototype we’ll capture one item.

questions.title: Any claims in the last 5 years?
Any motoring convictions in the last 5 years?
Can you provide proof of NCD?
Have you ever had insurance declined, cancelled or voided?
Here’s your indicative quote. You can choose to pay annually or monthly.

display.title: Here’s your indicative quote. You can choose to pay annually or monthly.
display.bodyHtml: Here’s your indicative quote. You can choose to pay annually or monthly.

questions.title: How would you like to pay?

display.bodyHtml:
What’s included

  • New-for-old parts (where applicable)
  • Windscreen cover (comprehensive)
  • Courtesy van (subject to availability)

questions.title:

- Wear and tear
- Use outside the policy terms
